subtitle: If liked, add a little of the measured out cheese to the basic raw egg mixture before cooking.

method.text: Heat a 15 - 18 cm omelette pan over a very gentle heat.
Beat together the eggs, water and seasoning until the eggs have just been mixed. If they are frothy they are over beaten.
Put the butter in the pan until it just sizzles then pour in the egg mixture.
With a spatula or fork gently draw the mixture from the sides to middle of the pan, allowing the uncooked egg to run to base of the pan and set.
When the base is firm and light golden brown, the top should be like soft scrambled egg.
Add the cheese and parsley, fold over and serve.

title: Cheese omelette
